price: Mengapa kalian menyuruh orang lain (mengerjakan) kebajikan, sedangkan kalian melupakan diri kalian sendiri, padahal kalian membaca Kitab (Taurat)? Tidakkah kalian mengerti?
arabic: ۞ أَتَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَتَنسَوۡنَ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَتۡلُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: atamurūna al-nāsa bil-biri watansawna anfusakum wa-antum tatlūna al-kitāba afalā taʿqilūna
